name: Out Of The Loop (itch)
description:
You must follow the games one simple command, which will put you into a very short timing based Platformer.

Note: This is a Windows build only.

Note two: This game is really bad

If You're having trouble downloading this

do these following steps:

  1. On your computer, open Chrome.
  2. At the top right, click More   Downloads.
  3. Find the file.
  4. Click keep dangerous file.
